thread.title: Pyongyang’s envoy to hold talks in U.S.

title: Pyongyang’s envoy to hold talks in U.S.
text:
Pyongyang’s envoy to hold talks in U.S. 6:37am BST - 01:27
A senior North Korean official is headed to New York to discuss an upcoming summit as U.S. diplomats travel to Singapore and the demilitarized zone, the latest indication that an on-again-off-again meeting between Trump and North Korea’s leader may go ahead next month. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A senior North Korean official is headed to New York to discuss an upcoming summit as U.S. diplomats travel to Singapore and the demilitarized zone, the latest indication that an on-again-off-again meeting between Trump and North Korea’s leader may go ahead next month.
